en.post_title: Immediate Edge Is Now Working With All Major Crypto Currency Exchanges
en.post_description: The secret is built in to the way the exchanges operate. The price of the coins goes up and down based on supply and demand, and the supply and demand for the currencies is different from one exchange to another. Because of this, often there are HUGE price difference in the same coin on different exchanges. Immediate Edge integrates seamlessly with Coinbase, Binance, Kraken, Poloniex, Bittrex and many more to give you an Immediate Edge and Instant Earnings.
